Get ready to be greated by tidyverse

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(ggplot2, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
  library(stringr)
})

```

Tidyverse is saying hello to the world.

```{r}
n = 2
str_glue("This is a test with a variable n = {n}")
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: !expr 'str_glue("This is a test with a variable n = {n}")'

ggplot() + 
  annotate(
  "text",
  x = 4,
  y = 25,
  label = "Hello world",
  size = 25
)

```
